Name: SkyIsland
About the game: Synopsis While trying to make his grandfather's dream come true, An unknown creature attacked Pino, which led him to crash-land on the Skyisland. To return home safely, fix his broken plane, and defeat the monster. The game 'SkyIsland' is an adventure game created by a team of college students. You can use a sword, spear, and hammer as primary weapons and a bow as a secondary weapon. Each weapon has its own identity and temporary skill. You can advance these weapons to make them more powerful. Charming Levels SkyIsland has four islands as a theme Spring island 'Epirus' is filled with blue sky, grass, and flowers. Summer island 'Io' with lush forests and a village of puris. Autumn island 'Thessaly' has unpredictable monster-filled wheat fields and many types of mushrooms. Winter island 'Crete' where everything is frozen and inhabited but only snow golems. Enjoy the game with its fantastic story and graphics! ----------------------------------------------------------------- Sound support - Artive Sound Team(official@artivesound.com)
